citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on
02/04/2015. After speaking with an individual at the facility, it was relayed that no one would be available to walk
through the inspection process until the afternoon.

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on

through the inspection process until the afternoon.
